title: Greeting Card, ""Stay on shore, - oh, stay with me..."", ca. 1821
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Robert W. Van Boskerck
description: Folio. Man in naval uniform at right, holds hand of woman who gestures toward sea.  A ship is seen to left.  Cupid at right, holds part of an anchor.  Foliage in background. Eight lines of verse below. Decorative border.

tombstone.epitaph: Greeting Card, ""Stay on shore, - oh, stay with me..."", ca. 1821.Black ink, water colors. Museum purchase through gift of Robert W. Van Boskerck. 1949-59-1.
